Class TextEngine

java.lang.Object
  modules.experiment.TextEngine

public class TextEngine
extends java.lang.Object

Responsible for saving/loading Experiment's data to/from Text files.

Method Detail

readExpInfoFromTXTFile

public boolean readExpInfoFromTXTFile(java.lang.String file_name,
                                      Experiment exp)
Loads Experiment's data from a Text file to an Experiment object.

Parameters:
file_name - file path to the text file containing the experiment's information
exp - Experiment object to load the information to
Returns:
true: success, false: failure

writeExpInfoToTXTFile

public void writeExpInfoToTXTFile(java.lang.String filename,
                                  Experiment exp)
Saves the Experiment's information to a Text file.

Parameters:
filename - file path to save the experiment information to
exp - the Experiment to save its information
